Reviews.Title: Nice but HUGE
Reviews.Author: m9777
Reviews.Content: 3 stars on the phone and 0 (zero) stars on the seller...BuyMobilesDirect.  Misleading return/refund policy. I was told via e-mail...Quote..."in order to receive a refund, everything needs to be intact.  Original box, packaging, stickers on the phone, if so you may send it back for a refund less 20% restocking fee. If there are any signs of usage on the phone we cannot accept it back."  This response was received when I asked for store CREDIT...not refund! Their policy effectively removes a buyer's ability to even TRY the phone. Well, enough of the complaining.  The phone works well but it is HUGE. So, if you don't wear a XXL glove, you probably will not like this model very much!

Reviews.Title: Custom Made for AT&T;
Reviews.Author: James J. Varela
Reviews.Content: Make sure when you buy an unlocked Q9H your wireless provider's DATA plan works with this phone. This phone was an AT&T; exclusive and there are many features that are unique to AT&T.; Beyond that a magnificent phone, built like a tank and the most user friendly Smartphone I have ever used.

Reviews.Title: Too bad they dropped this line.
Reviews.Author: Brad D Langford
Reviews.Content: Love this phone.  First off it looks very slick in my opinion.  QWERTY keyboard has very nice sized button that are tactile enough that you know you pushed it, so no run away repeating characters.  Display is very vibrant and clear.  This bar style phone is bigger than my old Blackjack 2, and I like that.  It has a solid feel but yet is lighter than my Blackjack2  I purchased this as I feel the need to have a Windows Mobile phone.  With my job I like having certain documents on the phone.  This makes for great reference to important things for me when I don't have access to the information at work.  That and syncing with Outlook always makes keeping calendar and contacts a breeze.  The converstaion threads with texting is a new thing for me, and I must say I really like that ability.  Dual speakers located under the back cover do a really good job on speaker phone and playing MP3's.Now for some of the bad.  Don't expect the battery life that is reported.  These phones have been out of production for a years so the batteries are a little older.  You'd think having been in a box it wouldn't be too bad, and it isn't.  Overall battery life is very good.  Another thing is that the Mobile Office apps do not support Office 2010 out of the box.  Looks like there is an update that may get you there.  2003 works great, 2007 requires an update also I think.  No WiFi available on this phone, that would have a great feature for this phone.

Reviews.Title: Best simple phone
Reviews.Author: Hypnos
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a simple PDA that fills out all your office needs (email, internet, calendar, corporate instant messaging, personal instant messaging, etc) you may want one of this phones. Easy to set up, easy to use, simple and with a good mobile version... I know many people want to have a Win7 phone, but this one rocks!Got exactly what I was looking for, and beyond that, a shape that looks like a very expensive phone, for the best price.You won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: Be careful before you open the box.
Reviews.Content: Motorola q9h.I have had this phone for 3 years. I have purchased it 4 times with att and they stopes selling this phone.  I have purchased this phone from othr vendor an it always comes with an extended battery.  However when I purchased from this vendor they didn't send me the extended batter. I puchased 3 phone and to my surprise the seller stated that once you open the box you can not return the item.  I then net on amazon to check for extended batteris and to my suprise guess who is selling the extra batteries.OEM,  B careful when you order and who you order from. I will give this seller half a * for dishonest. ME NEVER GAIN!!!!

Reviews.Title: Moto Q9H is great!
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: This phone is still the best window mobile phone ever. Hate that it is discontinued. Greatest sound of any phone i've ever heard.

Reviews.Title: I don't recomend the seller.
Reviews.Author: Xenve
Reviews.Content: i have bought several items in amazon but when I bought my motorola q9h I didn't know I was getting only my cell phone and the charger (that's all you get) so I look for the CD with the software to sync my cell phone with my computer. I bought the software to the same seller "The OEM Shop" and when I received my package I only received my USB cable but the CD was missing .... I sent an email explainig my situation, on October14th I received an email informing that they were going to send me another CD, in October 29th I sent another email asking if they sent it again because I haven't been able to sync my cell phone with my computer and I bought it on September 24th. On November 1st I received ANOTHER email asking me to double check that someone in my house does not have the order and they included my tracking number. I checked in USPS and that was the tracking number for the first package the one with the USB cable, I sent another email asking them to DOUBLE CHECK my order but guess what? I didn't received an answer.This is the worst seller I could have chosen to buy a cell phone, if you want to use it with your headset you have to buy it because is not included with your cell phone......

Reviews.Title: big wide cell phone
Reviews.Author: Deseno Grafix
Reviews.Content: i ordered this motorola cell phone for my mom. she said its ok, she's not a big fan of motorola but it rings very loud, so that's good. the screen resolution is excellent, sharp. she doesnt like how it cant ring & vibrate at the same time. most simpler phones can do that. she is 73 yrs so she finds this pocket pc complicated to use, more suitable for a younger person but shes learning it day by day.its very beautiful inappearance, professional looking, the keyboard feels lik satin. but she prefers a simple nokia.

Reviews.Title: OldieMy  but a goodie
Reviews.Author: Julius Caesar "All Hail Caesar"
Reviews.Content: Just past 5 years with this phone, it was my first, and only smart phone.  My kids get all the upgrades!  This performs well, i have had to order one other battery but that is it!  Keep mine in a case always and still in perfect shape.  Will hate to give it up.  Versus other newer smart phones this is an antique but a damn good phone.  My only complaint is where they placed the function button, sometimes you type 100 characters before you see you're typing symbols!  hate it!  4 of 5 stars from me.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!!!
Reviews.Author: Silly Dilly
Reviews.Content: My brother loves his new phone! It was brand spanking new! The buyer was friendly as well. These are the only phones that my brother loves. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: I bought a unlocked phone but you sent me a locked phone
Reviews.Author: Hmitzka
Reviews.Content: First of all you sent me a locked phone, it doesnt work! I paid for a unlocked phone, what happens now? Do I have to sent the phone and pay the charges or what? I don't know what I do?

Reviews.Title: Round two
Reviews.Author: Haberdasher
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because I already had this phone. After 3 years and countless drops and other mishandlings though, it finally kicked the bucket. Mostly my fault. So I replaced it, bam. Good phone, good call clarity, etc etc. I bought it twice, should say enough.

Reviews.Title: it's not as it looks at all
Reviews.Author: Adnan
Reviews.Content: most of these phones look new but in a strange way , i mean definitely something was wrong with the phone , i don't know what it is but i don't recommend it at all , it's not worth the price at all .

Reviews.Title: BEST SMARTPHONE W/OUT DATA PLAN
Reviews.Author: Concerned Consumer
Reviews.Content: I'm replacing my worn out old Moto Q9h with this purchase. Thanks Amazon for continuing to stock this item. Got a great deal from Amazon's Wherehouse. Like new is was an accurate description. I enjoy syncing MS Outlook (particularly my calendar and contacts)from my PC to this phone and not have to pay a DATA PLAN from my carrier (AT&T;). Windows Mobile 6.1 does just that and with a high quality Motorola phone.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Dora A. Abankwah "Akobanks"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to use on my international trip. It gave me some problems, but fortunately phones can be fixed in the country I visited. It is an ok phone,

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: o yeah
Reviews.Content: this item is ok for the price but phone is to slowdoesnt respond quickly and the return policy is crap7 day after arrival not enough time to return 3 to 5 days

Reviews.Title: I don't recomend this seller
Reviews.Author: Andres G. Viquez V
Reviews.Content: I ordered an unlock phone nevertheless I received a locked cell phone (AT&T;), the seal was broken and some accessories were missing like the audio adapter, mini USB charging adaptor and lithium ion batteries.This is the worst seller I could have chosen to buy a cell phone

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-band/3G smartphone with Windows Mobile 6 for MS Office document editing and easy Outlook email and contacts
Full QWERTY keyboard; Bluetooth stereo music streaming; 2.0 megapixel camera; MicroSD expansion
Internal GPS receiver with support for TeleNav software; music and video downloads and streams via AT&T; Mobile Music and Cellular Video
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola MOTO Q9H SILVER Unlocked Phone with 2MP Camera and Windows Mobile 6.0 - US Warranty
